00021 template <class Base>
00022 class TViewExtenderCompBase: public Base, virtual public IViewExtender
00023 {
00024 public:
00025        typedef Base BaseClass;
00026 
00027        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TViewExtenderCompBase);
00028               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IViewExtender);
00029               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtender", "Scene extender will be used to provide background shapes", false, "SlaveSceneExtender");
00030               I_ASSIGN(m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr, "ViewExtenderMode", "Control how the view extender works:\n\t0 - combine slave with current shapes\n\t1 - use slave by direct calls only\n\t2 - use slave always and current shapes indirect only\n\t3 - use slave by direct calls only and current shapes indirect only", true, 0);
00031               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_idFiltersAttrPtr, "SceneIdFilters", "Optional scene ID filters allowing to ignore some scene providers", false);
00032        I_END_COMPONENT;
00033 
00034        TViewExtenderCompBase();
00035 
00036        // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00037        virtual void AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
00038        virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr);
00039 
00040 protected:
00041        enum ExtenderMode
00042        {
00043               EM_COMBINE,
00044               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY,
00045               EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT,
00046               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT
00047        };
00048 
00049        typedef istd::TPointerVector<iview::IShape> Shapes;
00050        typedef QMap<IViewProvider*, Shapes> ShapesMap;
00051 
00052        bool IsSceneIdSupported(int id) const;
00053        const ShapesMap& GetShapesMap() const;
00054 
00055        void UpdateAllViews();
00056 
00057        // abstract methods
00058        virtual void CreateShapes(int sceneId, Shapes& result) = 0;
00059 
00060 private:
00061        ShapesMap m_shapesMap;
00062        bool m_isSlaveShown;
00063 
00064        I_REF(IViewExtender, m_slaveExtenderCompPtr);
00065        I_ATTR(int, m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr);
00066        I_MULTIATTR(int, m_idFiltersAttrPtr);
00067 };

00074 :      m_isSlaveShown(false)

00079 // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00080 
00081 template <class Base>
00082 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
00083 {
00084        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00085 
00086        int id = providerPtr->GetViewId();
00087        iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00088 
00089        bool showOwnShapes = true;
00090        bool showSlaveShapes = true;
00091 
00092        switch (*m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr){
00093        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY:
00094               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00095               break;
00096 
00097        case EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00098               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00099               break;
00100 
00101        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00102               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00103               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00104               break;
00105 
00106        default:
00107               break;
00108        };
00109 
00110 
00111        if (          showOwnShapes &&
00112                             (viewPtr != NULL) &&
00113                             IsSceneIdSupported(id) &&
00114                             (m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr) == m_shapesMap.end())){
00115               Shapes& shapes = m_shapesMap[providerPtr];
00116 
00117               bool isBackground = ((flags & SF_BACKGROUND) != 0);
00118               CreateShapes(id, shapes);
00119 
00120               int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00121               for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00122                      iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00123                      if (shapePtr != NULL){
00124                             if (isBackground){
00125                                    iview::CShapeBase* shapeImplPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CShapeBase*>(shapePtr);
00126                                    if (shapeImplPtr != NULL){
00127                                           shapeImplPtr->AssignToLayer(iview::IViewLayer::LT_INACTIVE);
00128                                    }
00129                             }
00130 
00131                             viewPtr->ConnectShape(shapePtr);
00132                      }
00133               }
00134        }
00135 
00136        if (showSlaveShapes && m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00137               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, (flags | SF_BACKGROUND) & ~SF_DIRECT);
00138 
00139               m_isSlaveShown = true;
00140        }
00141        else{
00142               m_isSlaveShown = false;
00143        }
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 template <class Base>
00148 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr)
00149 {
00150        I_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00151 
00152        if (m_isSlaveShown){
00153               I_ASSERT(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid());
00154 
00155               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
00156        }
00157 
00158        ShapesMap::iterator iter = m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr);
00159        if (iter != m_shapesMap.end()){
00160               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00161 
00162               if (viewPtr != NULL){
00163                      Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
00164 
00165                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00166                      for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00167                             iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00168                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00169                                    viewPtr->DisconnectShape(shapePtr);
00170                             }
00171                      }
00172               }
00173 
00174               m_shapesMap.erase(iter);
00175        }
00176 }

00181 template <class Base>
00182 bool TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::IsSceneIdSupported(int id) const
00183 {
00184        if (m_idFiltersAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00185               int filtersCount = m_idFiltersAttrPtr.GetCount();
00186               for (int i = 0; i < filtersCount; ++i){
00187                      int filterId = m_idFiltersAttrPtr[i];
00188                      if (id == filterId){
00189                             return true;
00190                      }
00191               }
00192 
00193               return false;
00194        }
00195 
00196        return true;
00197 }
00198

00200 template <class Base>
00201 const typename TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::ShapesMap& TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::GetShapesMap() const
00202 {
00203        return m_shapesMap;
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 template <class Base>
00208 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::UpdateAllViews()
00209 {
00210        for (ShapesMap::iterator index = m_shapesMap.begin(); index != m_shapesMap.end(); index++){
00211               IViewProvider* viewProvderPtr = index.key();
00212               I_ASSERT(viewProvderPtr != NULL);
00213 
00214               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = viewProvderPtr->GetView();
00215               I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00216 
00217               viewPtr->Update();
00218        }
00219 }
